modName: Ring and Spell of Life Sensing
summary:
This is Mofomojo\'s Ring and Spells of Life Sensing. 

For the Ring:
An ever pepetual \"Detect Life\" with no need to recast or equip/unequip etc,. to keep the ring active. As long as you\'re wearing the ring, people within 150 radius will glow in that nice amethyst purple shimmer. 

For the Spell: 
It works similar to the ring. Cast it once
descriptionHtml:
==============
Ring and Spells of Life Sensing ver 1.3
By: MofoMojo
==============

==============
Description
==============
This is Mofomojo\'s Ring and Spells of Life Sensing. 

For the Ring:
An ever pepetual \"Detect Life\" with no need to recast or equip/unequip etc,. to keep the ring active. As long as you\'re wearing the ring, people within 150 radius will glow in that nice amethyst purple shimmer. 

For the Spell: 
It works similar to the ring. Cast it once to activate, cast it again to de-activate


==============
Features
==============
Perpetual Life Sensing Ring and Spells


================
Current Version Changes
================
1.3
Made spell properly toggleable

1.2
Fixed Bad release with 1.1

1.1
Added Spell

1.0
Initial Release, Ring Only

================
HOW TO INSTALL
================

--------------
==Plugin==
--------------
-Open the Skyrim launcher
-Click on data files
-Check \"MM_SenseLife\"

---------
==In Game==
---------
Currently...get the spell with help sense. One spell is for the ring, when you can disregard. Use Player.AddSpell ######## to add the \"Sense Life\" spell. 

You can craft the ring at the forge with the following ingredients:
Silver Amethyst Ring
Deathbell
Glowing Mushroom
author: MofoMojo
